name: Pity The Pooh
description:
Pity the pooh, a game planned to be made in a weekend before moving far past initial planning. In this game, you ride a bear terrorizing a city and try not to get killed by the police. It is a one-button endless runner. Have Fun!

Currently, this game is on indefinite hold as it was always designed to be a free game and never was meant to be worked on for longer than a month. This will remain true unless there is a significant desire to see it completed.
